articles.author: Neil Genzlinger
articles.title: Ellen McIlwaine, Slide Guitarist With a Power Voice, Dies at 75
articles.description: Early in her career she played with Jimi Hendrix. She went on to record several well-regarded albums. But she remained under the radar.
articles.content:
When we came back to the United States and I started college in Tennessee, the only piano was in the boys dorm, she said, so I borrowed a guitar that belonged to somebody, and I liked it.
She droppe… [+1463 chars]

articles.author: Penelope Green
articles.title: Cornelia Oberlander, a Farsighted Landscape Architect, Dies at 99
articles.description: Her acclaimed modernist but naturalist designs recognized the fragility of the climate and the social effects of parks and playgrounds.
articles.content: She was a landscape architect who studied housing, who studied cities, the architecture critic Paul Goldberger wrote of Ms. Oberlander in 2019, when the Cultural Landscape Foundation established an a… [+1370 chars]

articles.author: Alix Strauss
articles.title: A Romance Author’s Muse Becomes His Real-Life Love Interest
articles.description: Kimberlee Stevenson was a fan of John Murray’s books. After they connected on social media, he became her biggest admirer.
articles.content: Mr. Murray spoke similarly. When she held my hand it felt like coming home she made me feel calm, he said. Im a nurturer and a caring person. She became the one I wanted to give attention, help and l… [+1560 chars]

articles.author: Kathryn Shattuck
articles.title: Joseph Fiennes Loved the ‘Catharsis’ of the ‘Handmaid’s Tale’ Finale
articles.description: In an interview, the actor discussed the end of Season 4, the future of the show and the emotional toll of playing “an ugly, pathetic, misogynist monster.”
articles.content:
Is that enough to bring about redemption?
No, Fred is a repeat offender an ugly, pathetic, misogynist monster that will never change. I felt like Fred wouldnt redeem himself in the way that we want … [+1580 chars]

articles.author: Alix Strauss
articles.title: Meet the Hindu Priest Officiating L.G.B.T.Q. Weddings
articles.description: Sushma Dwivedi offers nuptials and other religious services to underserved people.
articles.content: As a Hindu pundit, or priest, who focuses on the L.G.B.T.Q. population, Sushma Dwivedi is a rarity in the wedding industry. Its close to impossible to find a woman pundit here in the States, she said… [+1322 chars]
